snippet: The merger, driven in part by pricing pressures from Boeing and Airbus, expands the range of products that Rockwell supplies and broadens its customer base internationally....
abstract: Aircraft component maker Rockwell Collins says it will buy B/E Aerospace for $6.4 billion.
lead_paragraph: The merger, driven in part by pricing pressures from Boeing and Airbus, expands the range of products that Rockwell supplies and broadens its customer base internationally.

headline.main: Aircraft Supplier Rockwell Collins to Buy B/E Aerospace for $6.4 Billion
headline.print_headline: Rockwell Collins Agrees to Buy B/E Aerospace
